meanings.def: expressed in writing rather than in speech
examples: Having a written record of what I've done is very valuable.
The council is inviting written submissions from the public before June 19.

meanings.def: involving writing rather than speaking or practical skills
examples: Students must submit one or more pieces of written work for assessment.

meanings.def: in the form of a letter, document, etc. and therefore official
examples: No portion of this site may be copied without express written consent.
You must give written permission before this information can be shared.
In a written statement, the government has denied the claims.

meanings.def: language expressed in writing rather than in speech
examples: the permanence of the written word

idioms.def: language expressed in writing rather than in speech
examples: the permanence of the written word

related: Elegy Written in a Country Church Yard
be written all over somebody’s face
not worth the paper it’s written/printed on
have something/somebody written all over it/somebody
